head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KLEIN, MURRAY A.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KLEIN, MURRAY A.

block.p: KLEIN--Murray A., 84, died January 18, 2007, after a brief illness. He was a pillar of the retail community, an owner of Fine and Klein Handbags on the Lower East Side. He was the beloved husband of Esther, his wife of 54 years; devoted father to Sharon, Michael and Linda; and grandfather to Brooke, Brandon and Derek.
